page.title: 18Family Life In Hoo.
page.content:
I woke up at 7.30 on Saturday morning. I got washed and then by 9.45 we were on the way to the Ice Rink.We were there for three hours.At around 1.00 we went home and had lunch. Then I went out with some friends and we played tennis. At 4.45 I came in and had a bite to eat. Later we went to the pub and at 7.15 we went to a barbecue. At 10.30 we went home. On Sunday morning I woke up at 8.00. I got washed and dressed and had breakfast, then I went to get the daily newspaper. After a while I went swimming with friends. Then I did my homework. After that we played tennis. Then I had my dinner. For the rest of the day I stayed in and watched the television. {
{
